Multi-Modal Pipeline Tutorial

Tutorial for building multi-modal classification pipelines with MARVIS.

Note

This tutorial is under development.

Coming Soon

This tutorial will cover:

  • Combining tabular, vision, and audio data

  • Multi-modal feature fusion strategies

  • Cross-modal visualization techniques

  • Ensemble methods and model combination

Interim Resources

See examples/unified_marvis_example.py for multi-modal examples.
